mapper.select: SELECT NVL(T1.TXINV_PBL_OJ_YN, ' ') AS TXINV_PBL_OJ_YN /* 세금계산서발행여부 */ , NVL(T3.BZRNO, ' ') AS BZRNO , NVL(T4.DLPNR_NM, T3.CST_KNM) AS DLPNR_NM , NVL(T5.DLPNR_PSIC_NM, ' ') AS DLPNR_PSIC_NM , T5.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO , T5.MEXNO_ENCR AS MEXNO , T5.CRAL_IDV_TNO , T5.EMADR /* 메일주소 */ , SUBSTR(T5.EMADR, 0, INSTR(T5.EMADR, '@')-1) AS EMADR1 /*@앞 메일주소*/ , SUBSTR(T5.EMADR, INSTR(T5.EMADR, '@')+1) AS EMADR2 /*@뒤 메일주소*/ , T5.TXINV_PBL_D , T5.TXINV_PD_DV_CD /* 세금계산서상품구분코드 */ , T5.TXINV_PBL_DV_CD /* 세금계산서발행구분코드 */ , T5.CNTR_CST_NO /* 계약고객번호 */ , T5.TXINV_BNDL_SN /* 세금계산서묶음일련번호 */ , T5.IDV_TNO /* 개별전화번호 */ , T5.RMK_CN /* 비고내용 */ , T5.MVS_DSTC_RCVRY_BASE_DTM /* 소산파기복구기준일시 */ , T5.MVS_DSTC_RCVRY_DV_CD /* 소산파기복구구분코드 */ , T5.MVS_DSTC_RCVRY_DTM /* 소산파기복구일시 */ FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T1 INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS T2 ON T2.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_BAS T3 ON T3.CST_NO = T2.CNTR_CST_NO AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_GBCO_DLPNR_BAS T4 ON T4.BZRNO = T3.BZRNO AND T4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_TXINV_RCP_BASE_IZ T5 ON T5.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T5.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND T5.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND T1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND T1.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N'

SELECT NVL(T1.TXINV_PBL_OJ_YN, '') AS TXINV_PBL_OJ_YN /* 세금계산서발행여부 */ , NVL(T2.CNTR_CNFM_DTM, '') AS CNTR_CNFM_DTM /* 계약확정일시 */ , NVL(T3.BZRNO, '') AS BZRNO /* 사업자등록번호 */ , NVL(T4.DLPNR_CD , '') AS DLPNR_CD/* 거래처코드 */ , NVL(T4.DLPNR_NM, T3.CST_KNM) AS DLPNR_NM /* 거래처명 */ , NVL(T5.DLPNR_PSIC_NM, '') AS DLPNR_PSIC_NM /* 거래처담당자명 */ , NVL(T5.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO, '') AS CRAL_LOCARA_TNO /* 휴대지역전화번호 */ , NVL(T5.MEXNO_ENCR, '') AS MEXNO /* 휴대전화국번호암호화 */ , NVL(T5.CRAL_IDV_TNO, '') AS CRAL_IDV_TNO /* 휴대개별전화번호 */ , NVL(T5.EMADR, '') AS EMADR /* 전자 이메일 주소 */ , NVL(T5.TXINV_PBL_D, 0) AS TXINV_PBL_D , NVL(T6.DP_TP_CD, '') AS DP_TP_CD /* 입금유형코드 */ FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T1 INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS T2 ON T2.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_BAS T3 ON T3.CST_NO = T2.CNTR_CST_NO AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_GBCO_DLPNR_BAS T4 ON T4.BZRNO = T3.BZRNO AND T4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_TXINV_RCP_BASE_IZ T5 ON T5.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T5.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND T5.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_STLM_REL T6 ON T6.CNTR_STLM_REL_ID = (SELECT MAX(CNTR_STLM_REL_ID) FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_STLM_REL WHERE DTL_CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND DTL_CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN) AND T6.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND T1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND T1.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N'
mapper.update:

WHERE 1 = 1 AND CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} /* 계약번호 */ AND CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} /* 계약일련번호 */
